Target - Interface in it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.cards
The interface for the targets with basic method implementation for the possible targets of effects.
TargetType - Enum in it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.cards.effects
An enum to differentiate target types directly.
TargetTypeException - Exception in it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.exceptions.properties
It is thrown when someone's trying to execute an effect on a wrong target type.

Creates the exception.
targetView(Effect, Player, List<Target>) - Static method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.cards.effects.properties.PropertiesAnalyzer
Checks the targetView property given the effect, the activePlayer and the targetList.
TargetViewException - Exception in it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.exceptions.properties
It is thrown when someone's trying to execute an effect on a target he should see but can't, or vice versa.

Terminal - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.console.terminal
This class is the virtual terminal used to separate input and output streams on the real terminal.
terminalRefresh() - Static method in class it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.console.terminal.Terminal
